title.rendered: Interview on University Education on Sunrise Radio (30th March, 2017)

content.rendered: Peter Holliday, COO Regent Group, interviewed with Sunrise Radio on university education on 30th March, 2017. In the interview he discussed the advantages of university education, how having a degree increases starting salaries, student loans, the higher education bill and the impact of Brexit on university education. Listen to the full interview here.
